Afghanistan,[lower-alpha 3] bụ eze Islamic Emirate nke Afghanistan, [lower-alpha 4] bụ obodo enweghị oke ala nke dị na okporo ụzọ Central Asia na South Asia

A na-akpọ ya dị ka Obi nke Eshia,  gbara ya gburugburu Pakistan n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ na ndịda, [ala-alpha 5] Iran n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ, Turkmenistan n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ, Uzbekistan n'ebe ugwu, Tajikistan n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ, na China
n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ na n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ
N'ịbụ nke nwere 652,864 square kilometa (252,072 sq mi) nke ala, obodo a kacha nwee ugwu nwere ala dị larịị na ugwu na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ, nke oke ugwu Hindu Kush kewapụrụ
Dị ka nke 2021 [mmelite], ndị bi na ya bụ nde 40.2,  mebere ọtụtụ agbụrụ Pashtuns, Tajik, Hazaras na Uzbek
Kabul bụ obodo kachasị ukwuu na obodo ahụ ma na-ejekwa ozi dị ka isi obodo ya￼
